text: Khawa thengnga Keelngamteii khan kuruk huuina madanna kha makoiya imalong kha kei'n kaleimu. Khawa phakhan rinook kangar inkhat aleihong, kani khan keelmulla inbool puonwom insatak angjei, halli tha khan thisen angnga senjei. Chonglar 11:13; 16:18; Isa 13:10; Matt 24:29; Mk 13:24,25; Luk 21:25
